content.prompt: Nam June Paik uses multichannel video in Electronic Superhighway to display which of the following?

choices.label: Live news broadcasts from around the globe

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a work of art (or group of related works of art), providing-  a. title or designation.  b. name of artist.  c. culture of origin.  d. style.  e. date of creation.  f. materials.
